name: QUEST (The Only Snowflake)
description:
Walk the dungeon. Slay the Dragon. Find the gold. Experience role-playing-action as it was intended.

With classic 16-bit graphics and 8-bit sound (to come at a later date), QUEST brings the beauty of 1980's gaming to the 21st century.

---

The game is pre-pre-alpha. The game is play-able, but not really. Enjoy walking around the dungeon and messing with the pause menu. The game is actively being developed and will be updated constantly.
